keyword: how many calories in taco bell chicken quesadilla
title: How Many Calories in Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and menu tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?
assumptions: Standard Taco Bell menu item: flour tortilla, grilled chicken, three-cheese blend, creamy jalapeño sauce; as served without modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and customizations. Check Taco Bell app or website for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Taco Bell chicken quesadilla contains 510 calories and 27 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with Taco Bell's official data.

tweaks.label: Fresco style (swap cheese/sauce for pico de gallo)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Approximately 510 calories for one standard quesadilla.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: About 27 g of protein per quesadilla.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Around 1230 mg of sodium, so watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Yes, about 45 g total carbs, including 3 g fiber from the tortilla and fillings.

faqs.q: Can I make Taco Bell chicken quesadilla lower calorie?
faqs.a: Opt for no sauce or fresco style to cut 50-80 calories; check customizations.
